item.description:
Catch A Healthy Habit Cafe is Celebrating & you are invited!!!!

The Cafe opens at noon

The party starts at 2 pm with food tastings,

Raw Food prep demo's & free raffle

at 4 pm we have a DJ rawking tunes

at 6 pm it's DRUM CIRCLE TIME!

at 7:30 sing a song KAROKE!

Free & open to the public -
Party Rawking style!

View scenes from our time in Biz party!

http://www.catchaheal...

www.catchahealthyhabit.com/

It depends on the weather if all of the events will be in the Cafe or if some
Events will be n the Court Yard next to the Cafe building.

Violet will be selling her pottery.
item.how_to_find_us: Glen is POC for this Event
item.name: Coffee Talk attends 18 Months in Business Gala on 8/2
